content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to create a color picker in HTML.
Color picker
Pick a color:
You can use the
input type="color"
attribute to create a color picker:
Example
<label for="favcolor">Select your favorite color:</label>
<input 
  type="color" id="favcolor" value="#ff0000">

Note that you have to use hex values inside the value property. The default value is black (#000000) if nothing is used. You can learn more about HEX values in our
HTML Colors Tutorial
.
